title: Riot is putting too much faith in their players with dynamic groups.
body: Getting matched with a 4 man premade is going to be the new biggest fear of ranked. I can see the trolling now. The 4 man afk,  all mid cuz Yolo, and surrendering while winning just to cost 1 other guy their promos.  Can't report all 4 of them either because the system will just ignore you for spamming it. And as for 5 man lobbies in soloq,  THOSE DO NOT BELONG HERE.  They have their own damn queues for a reason. When I saw "better ranked experience" I got hyped , but I don't see how quads and full premades in soloq helps any body but the trolls and ranked 5 teams.  Solo players like me are feeling thrown out to the curb. I just pray that a the tribunal returns soon so 4 man troll groups get banned.

replies.body:
the fact that the majority of people don't troll with kalista, tahm, or bard means that riot has the right idea about this.  just because a system can be abused by trolls does not mean they shouldn't implement it if the system enhances the experience of the game for the majority of the playerbase.  and think about what you're saying.  who the f-ck would spend 25+ just to ruin someone's promo games once.  how are they gonna find 3 more members with the same goals.  

also spamming report is not devalued by how often you report.  it's devalued by how false the report is.  if a 4 man premade does screw you over feel free to report.  they'll get the comeuppance
Most of the time they don't. But I swear every game I play with one, there's at least one troll-ish play made by them. Including when I'm the one playing them ;) Kappa.
If it is one that is called an accident. If they do it multiple times then it becomes troll.
what about the part where in solo que anyone who has communication or experience playing with one another has an advantage?
i think they want to encourage that.  they want to encourage people looking for partners while in ranked and seeking out communication with others.
They should join a ranked team and play in 5v5s for that not SOLO que

what if you only have 3 friends?  what if you have 10 friend but not more then 4 are on at the same time.  the barrier to entry is too large for ranked teams.

and for more [reading](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/11/red-post-collection-warding-you-ranked.html).

Hi!
Your argument is pretty valid, I don't think that people would abuse it with trolling or more than they do now at least.

It is also a good idea that RIOT encourage 2-3-4 premade (5 premade in dynamic is just bahhh.... whatever... wth man...why no TvT?). However, in the case of 4, RIOT also must FORCE people to go solo. I mean that is bs. 1 man has to play "solo" with 4 random players in a NOT SOLOQ gamemode.

My other arguement is what happens if 3-4 premades climb it to a certain rather high division. That is nice and I don't wanna take away their fun. BUT what happens if they separate? 1 man who only played with his premade wanna go, you know good ol' SOLOQ style, alone. Will he be really as a good as that division? I don't think so. Why is that? Because soloQ is not just about skill and knowing your role in team. NONO. 
You also have to adapt and conform if needed. And that is why soloQ so exciting imo. However, I don't know how RIOT gonna solve it
-----Theory ofc,I have no proof what will happen.

Many people "cry" about 4 men harrassing the 5th player also. Yeah, I understand that there will be cases where they will be nice. BUT I think RIOT has to understand there will be bad ones too. Mainly in lower division I guess. I am not saying this, because I just can't take any harassment. I am perfectly fine if one random dude trashtalking in soloQ, I get over it. However if my entire team gonna flame me.... that is just disgusting.

tl;dr  "PURE" SOLOQ
or DYNAMIC without 4-1 teams
or if really necessary to do it with 4-1 teams, make more severe punishment for premades, like 1 of their member chatbanned, all of them chatbanned. Too much. Yes. 2 months and no teams dare to have toxic players.   

OFF TOPIC: Why can't we see who is premade? Not necessary in game, but after game?

Another major point...Riot stated it's close to a 95% chance you will be matched with and against a similar group structure. So 5 man will get with 5 man, 4+1 will get will 4+1, and it will be extremely rare cases where a 5 man would go against all randoms.

This game is a cancer i force myself to suffer through finally this stupid dnaymic group for ranked will be the nail in my coffin to get to me stop playing, I know i wont be missed but my life will be better for having this cancerous game removed from my play list. Enjoy your game time playing either with or against 4 people on voice coms and then feeling their wrath when things don't work out for THEM. Based on my past experience i am sure the "automated chat ban system" will protect you very well :)

The "report this guy who hurt my feelings" syndrome has existed long before league.

I've been reported in runescape for telling someone their weapon was bad and for telling someone I didn't believe in god. I got reported for going to a group of people cheering for Zamorak and chanting Gunthix.

I've been petitioned in Eve Online for killing people in PvP (was fairly common)

I've had people report my Xbox live account for doing well in a match of Halo 3, or for telling someone their aim was bad and they shouldn't be using a sniper.

I've had endless instances of people raging and leaving starcraft games for any number of absolutely silly reasons.

My last decade of gaming is full of people seeking senseless vindication for how I've affected their personal feelings in some complethey irratonal way. It's not new in league. It's just people.

As far as "toxic every game". What do you mean. Angry and condescending? I am too. I don't think that's what riot targets most.

The people they punish are the ones who can't go 4 games without wishing cancer and aids upon 9 other people. The ones who aren't even raging at their teammates, they're just raging.These people don't belong in any online game. They belong in a therapists office.

Angrily trying to be constructive, which many entitled brats think is toxic, isn't really that toxic. It's often not helpful, but there's a difference between "if you fucking retards can avoid doing something completley mindleslsly stupid for 2 minutes, I can push thier inhib" (actual in game quote by me) and "u fucking noob shit I hope your mom gets cancer go uninstall you n@@@@r fuck you trash %%%got".

There are people who actually think the latter is an okay form of interacting with other humans. I don't want them in any game I play. I don't think it's as easy to get banned for the former.

Honestly I think this is a great implementation.

Along with the new champion select you pick the roles you prefer and the champion you would like to play before bans even take place. You'll never be put in a role you don't want to play and you can queue up with friends without requiring a 5 man team.

Plus people like to bitch about things before even trying them.

The cause of toxicity is being trolled, which causes people to troll others. When people are allowed to play with who they want, in the position and role they want, they will be less likely to be toxic, which will make them less likely to troll. 

There aren't actually very many "trolls", there are just angry, frustrated players. Remove the frustration (which is what this does) and you remove most of trolling.
This basically. The few trolls we end up with after this update will be the genuine assholes of the community, and will stick out like a sore thumb which should lead to a more swift banning process.
I want to play with 4 random people, and I want the other team to be 5 random people. Do I get what I want?

According to Lyte, you almost never have that right now, with almost every game having at least one duo in it. If you want to play with 9 completely unrelated players, you should look into a different game.

If four people are queuing up for **ranked** together (not norms, as we're used to), chances are their priority is winning as opposed to screwing around. The vast majority of people queuing up for ranked have gaining LP as their priority.

It goes other way around aswell..

4-man premade and troll as fifth. Even worse if Troll picks important role (like ADC or TOP).

**Rip ranked... 4-5 premades can use software like skype or curse voice to easily communicate between them which is some kind of CHEAT imo.**

You can use curse voice with randoms starting in the lobby if they agree to do so. If you do not want to capitalize on that option that is your decision for potentially gimping yourself by being the team without the easy to access voice chat.

The three times I used curse voice, I got a racist, a toxic, and a loudmouth neckbeard rager. No thanks.  

That and curse voice is external software. You can't expect randoms to have it.
Voice chat isn't cheating, it's expected. Don't believe me? Look at any LCS match and tell me what team doesn't have voice chat.

If we are honest though guys, trolling is trolling. Report them and hope they get banned (lyte smites inc). Beyond that from what I've seen, first off people troll normals because there is little real and immediate consequence. Sure you could get banned if you do it a lot but there was no real reason not to troll in normals. In general, way less people troll ranked because wasted lp. If a troll queue wants to troll they will just do normals where they won't get dropped in elo for trolling.
Kind of off topic but lack of consequence compared to something like leaving a game is irksome.

I would never played ranked with them because i just like playing by myself and climbing by myself. I really wish they wouldn't do this for soloq, they have their own to play in. They have ranked teams, this just seems unfair to me because if i have taht 5% chance knowing my luck i'd probably go against a premade team which just ins't fair.
I guess riot gotta learn what the fuck SOLO QUEUE means.

Does it give small groups more power? Yes. Does it mean that every one of them will turn into trolls for it? Not likely.

Stop acting like all parties will do nothing but try to ruin your game, no one gives a shit about you, we just wanna win just like you do.

wow what an easy win!

This one is MUCH more likely than 4 people all playing against you since all 4 of them would lose 15 LP or so for the loss or potentially their own promos. I havent seen a troll in ages and this new system will keep it that way since there will be no more champ select hostages since they will almost always get their preferred role and if they don't go to their assigned role it is iirc a bannable or at least temp ban offense if it is done multiple times.

Yeah, cause the chance of getting 4 people fully dedicated to ruin one person's game is a lot bigger than the chance of getting multiple one persons trolling every single game.

Most of the time when you get in a 4-premade you are lucky. The four are in a team, your chances of winning are bigger. Not gonna deny the existence of group trolls, but they're A LOT less frequent than solo trolls, which you can get multiples in one single game. Solo trolls ruin nearly every game, at least in lower elo. Premade trolls are an extreme nuisance, but a rare one at that.

Like I said earlier the chances of you getting stuck in the 4 man premade is already low and the chance they are all going to troll just to mess with you and lose their OWN LP is even lower. The chances are so stacked against it and if anything Riot should just make an option to have a genuine solo queue via check box before you queue (not like it will change your solo queue time but may sort of increase group but they should know that going in).
